name: Bob the Amnesiac: Dungeon Crawler
description:
Bob the Amnesiac is a 2D Adventure game meant for people who do not back down from a challenge.The Player will  navigate maze-maps and and use the environment to help them find the exit. Some paths lead to nowhere, others lead to death, and only one leads to the exit.  This will not be an easy Adventure though; Players will most likely die at least once and will have to remember their paths they had taken (if they want to get Bob out of the dungeon).

Level Designer:

Angel F. Jimenez

Music from:

https://freesound.org/people/phlair/sounds/388340/

https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/262259/

https://freesound.org/people/Doctor_Dreamchip/sounds/458085/

Cobblestone Background from:

https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/resource-...
